title: Understanding Substitution
text: The substitution method involves solving one equation for a variable and substituting it into the other equation. This helps simplify the system to one equation with one variable.

title: Solving for a Variable
text: Choose one of the equations and solve for one variable in terms of the other. You can choose either $$x$$ or $$y$$. Which equation seems easier to solve for a variable?

title: Substitute Simplified Equation
text: Have you substituted the expression you obtained for one variable into the other equation yet? What does the resulting equation look like?

title: Simplify and Solve
text: Simplify the resulting equation from your substitution. What is the value of the remaining variable?

title: Back Substitution
text: Take the value of the solved variable and substitute it back into the original simplified equation. What is the value of the other variable?
